root.name: int

example.code: a = 23 # Declare variable 'a' and assign it the value 23 b = -256 # Declare variable 'b' and assign it the value -256 c = a + b # Declare variable 'c' and assign it the sum of 'a' and 'b'

root.description: Datatype for integers, numbers without a decimal point. Integers can be as large as 9,223,372,036,854,775,807 and as low as -9,223,372,036,854,775,808. They are stored as 32 bits of information.
